TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ScrollBar/ThumbButtonHorizontal extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of a horizontal scroll box (also known as the thumb). This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonHorizontal class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of a horizontal scroll box.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonHorizontal.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarThumbButtonHorizontal1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#81](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/62e605a1-39a9-4bd2-9aa5-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#81](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/62e605a1-39a9-4bd2-9aa5-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a horizontal scroll box in the disabled state.
Docs.value: A that represents a horizontal scroll box in the disabled state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Disabled property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Disabled property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarThumbButtonHorizontal4` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#84](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/64af0eae-b06d-4ecd-ac3f-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#84](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/64af0eae-b06d-4ecd-ac3f-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a horizontal scroll box in the hot state.

`DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarThumbButtonHorizontal2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
